name: Personal Summary 1
content:
1. Symptom Trends:
Mild cough observed throughout the week, with increased breathlessness on June 21 and 23.

2. Medication Adherence:
Controller medication taken on time 85% of the time. One reliever usage spike on June 23.

3. Environmental Triggers:
Pollen levels high on June 22–23, correlating with symptom worsening.

4. Emotion & Lifestyle:
Mood neutral to slightly anxious. Notes indicate poor sleep on June 21.

5. Final Summary:
Overall condition stable with environmental sensitivity. Suggested to maintain adherence and monitor air quality.

name: Personal Summary 2
content:
1. Symptom Trends:
Breathlessness improved over the week. Minor coughing episodes on June 28–29.

2. Medication Adherence:
High consistency. All reminders followed.

3. Environmental Triggers:
PM2.5 was moderate but no clear symptom link.

4. Emotion & Lifestyle:
Mood generally calm. User noted cleaning activities on June 27.

5. Final Summary:
No major concerns. Continue current routine. Review again next week.
